about_the_game:
■ Will the World End in July 2025? A Visual Novel Game Packed with Romance, Emotion, and Thrills with Handsome Hotties —Featuring Over 20 CGs!　 Japanese audio has been added to stills.■

Journey through modern Tokyo and 19th-century London—the iconic home of Sherlock Holmes—in this romantic mystery adventure. Play as Yukari Mochizuki, a young detective unraveling the secrets of urban legends through encounters with mysterious and charming men who hold the key to the truth.
Take on the role of Yukari, whose detective brother has mysteriously vanished. Alongside your loyal assistant, Watson-kun, you'll uncover the truth behind spine-chilling urban legends, solve escape-game-style challenges, and pursue the elusive Jack the Ripper hiding among five alluring suspects. Piece together the mysteries that tie these legends to a prophecy foretelling the end of the world.

The world will end in July 2025.
To prevent this dire future, Yukari must delve into the secrets of urban legends and uncover the truth hidden within two worlds.

◆◇◆ A Romantic Mystery Where Reality and Fantasy Collide ◆◇◆
Yukari Mochizuki spends her days at her missing brother's private detective office, desperately seeking clues to his disappearance. One day, a curious client approaches her with an unusual request, pulling her into an investigation that links her brother's case to popular urban legends spreading fear throughout the city.
This investigation leads Yukari into an extraordinary phenomenon: a journey between two worlds—modern-day Tokyo and the London of the late 19th century. In this alternate reality, she forges connections with the fascinating men she meets, unravels the mysteries hidden in their world, and fights to avert the looming crisis of global destruction.
Step into Yukari's shoes and solve the mysteries of two worlds. Can you stop the prophecy and save the future? The fate of the world is in your hands!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.4 and newer
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
